titleStmt.title: The pedlars case stated; or, some remarks upon the pedlars, and all their carrying of goods abroad to proffer to sale in all cities towns, and places throughout England and Wales, &c. in order to the prevention thereof.

The pedlars case stated; or, some remarks upon the pedlars, and all their carrying of goods abroad to proffer to sale in all cities towns, and places throughout England and Wales, &c. in order to the prevention thereof.

publicationStmt.publisher: These papers are to be had at the Three Pidgeons in Cornhil, London, over against the Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Lincoln's Inn Library, London.
